content.label: I love this game so much. Thank you to who ever made this game.
Good game, but lately it keeps kicking me out when I try to play.  It literally kicks me out to the iPad main menu.  I’d give it 5 stars if I didn’t have that issue.
This game crashes all the time not only on my device but on my friends devices as well. For a game you pay money for should be flawless. Disappointed.

title.label: Love this game but the app is glitchy

content.label:
I love this game and it’s fun and easy to play with friends but my biggest complaint is that it’s just generally glitchy. The most annoying glitch is that it will notify you when it’s your turn, but then when you play, the notification stays. To get rid of the notification you have exit the game and then go back in. Given there’s a time limit on the game, knowing when it’s your turn is kind of important...

Still worth the money and it’s fun to play with the bots, just please PLEASE prioritize the fix for this bug.
The more I play the harder it is to win.  Computer often makes it impossible so I have stopped.  Will return to board game.

First, I am always very upset when I find ‘isms in a game.  It is appalling that out of five game avatar choices there is only one (white) woman and the rest are white men.  In this day and age, seriously?!  You couldn't do better?  I will not be spending money to buy any of the boards while the company shows a complete disregard for representation.  I get that you are setting this during a particular time period, but there were people of multiple races and both sexes traveling by train during that time period.  I have daughters, they should be able to chose from a selection of female avatars, and there absolutely should be options for POC.

Second, I tried the solo option, but I am not at all interested in a game of cutthroat.  The bots are programmed to deliberately block players from achieving their goals.  The bot I was playing had two of the three possible routes to Los Angeles.  As soon as I turned to take the middle route, which required two track placements, the bot took the other.  It had all three routes, and the third route it placed led nowhere, since I had already placed my track in the other half.  Nope!  I am not interested in playing a game of deliberately inhibiting other players.  You need an option for cutthroat or simple strategizing.  I have children, and I buy mostly co-operative games because I am trying to teach my children that winning is not about destroying others but is about working towards your goals.  I know there are people who enjoy cutthroat, but make an option for those who do not.

A number of people had recommended this game to me.  I thought it would be a fun addition to our game library, but not as it is.

Love the game but recently is too frustrating to play. 

App doesn’t redirect to board when game starts so bots choose ur cards

Mid game route cards switch 

Mid game turns don’t select u so time is counted down when u don’t know it’s ur turn/ ur unable to choose cards until time runs out. 

Bots are getting too easy to beat

title.label: Don’t buy DLC and new maps

content.label: Rip off.  Paid for several new maps, totally unable to access now.  Contacting their support didn’t help.  Basic game works fine.

This is a great game to play with my family, but whenever I choose local it immediately takes me to online. It takes a few times until it finally lets me creat a game/join one. This needs to be fixed.

I absolutely love the game and have played on the app for years. For the last 2 months the app glitches, freezes, doesn’t keep time well. I can’t play for more than a minute without it closing out the app. Outrageous that there hasn’t been any updates for this long with such a popular and well loved game.

title.label: Love the game. But it crashes in iPad Air😔

content.label: I bought the game on iPad 8th gen. I recently upgraded to iPad Air. This game keeps on crashing. Cannot plan anymore ☹️☹️
I’ve loved playing this game but lately it crashes again and again. I’ve uninstalled and then installed several times with no success. Frustrating!
I love this game but since I got my iPhone 12 IOS 14.2.  when it starts to deal the cards my app crashes.

Love the game but for what seems like a year now in solo play it keeps crashing on restart after a game is completed or if I try to quit early and restart.  It happens 2 out of 3 times I restart before a game is complete.  Less if I complete a game but still often.  And it’ll crash on restart multiple times sometimes.  I’ve had it crash 5-6 times before finally starting.  I stopped playing for several months but recently started again and hoped the bug was fixed but it’s worse now.  Please look into this.

Also, for those of us who play solo and like to start over if we don’t like our starting route options can you make a faster way to restart the game without have to go back and reselect all game options.  This might be “cheating” but I’ve played many hundreds of times and for some of us playing solo, sometimes the game isn’t worth playing if you don’t get the right challenge to start.  I wouldn’t give the game 5 stars without the option for a quicker restart. It’s a small but annoying thing.  Please fix the crashing bug first though.  That makes it exponentially worse..

title.label: Love the Game, app crashes regularly

content.label: Our family loves this game, both the actual board game and playing on the app.  Please spend some time troubleshooting the app!  It regularly crashes when starting a new solo game and we often are frustrated that we can’t get a multi-player game (multiple devices) working.  Please help!

title.label: 2.7.10 crashes on game start on iPad Air 3rd gen

content.label: More than half of the time when I try to start a new solo game, the board appears and then it crashes ...or... it tells me I have an unfinished game and makes me re-watch the scoring an extra time (and then it crashes on rematch).  Sometime I have to reboot in order to get it to work.  I really do like the game.  It’s a family favorite from 5 year olds to 85 years old.  Just wish it didn’t crash on the ipad.  The nagging messages are worse on the iPhone...
Ticket to ride is great. It makes me proud of my self, but is still a challenge.
Constantly crashes
Love this game when it works, sadly it force quits more often than not.  It crashes roughly 7 out of 10 games, there are better ways to spend one’s time. Like playing the board game version.

title.label: Took away the maps I had purchased

content.label:
I really like this game.  I played it daily with my son while he is in his house and I in mine.  But yesterday when I tried to shift to one of the maps I had purchased, it told me to buy it.  “Restore purchases” , rebooting the game, rebooting my iPad, deleting and reloading the game ....nothing works.  The help section says that when you ask to reload purchases the game will ask for Apple ID, but it doesn’t.  I sent a complaint to Asmodee, and while they acknowledged receipt, there has been no other response.  I see in the chat section that others are have had the same problem.  I will change my rating when this is corrected.
Edit:

The developer fixed the bug that caused me to lose my maps, so I’m changing my rating to 4 stars. It’s a great game, and you can play it online, a huge advantage in this pandemic.

title.label: Love this game but MANY bugs

content.label: I love this game, and it’s great to be able to play against live people online. The game has soooo many bugs unfortunately. I have not found a way to contact support and file my issues either. It freezes often, last night I was kicked out of 4 games that I had played almost until the end due to freezing issues. Often you have to reload the game after the game players all enter so the bot ends of choosing your routes. I came here thinking there must be an update, but there is not. If the game would run smoothly and have its issues fixed it would be 5 stars. Right now I am just frustrated I spent money for a game that doesn’t work.

I own three TTR board games. We love the game. The digital game is fun too. The app keeps canceling my purchases and won’t restore those purchases when I try to play. I do not recommend buying additional versions of the game.
Since the 10/27 update, three maps I purchased are now locked out and telling me I must purchase.
Please fix this. I would like them back, please!

title.label: New Update Lost My Game Purchase

content.label: I updated the app as needed but it lost my games purchased. I’ve hit the restore purchases button numerous times but I have nothing but the America game. I lost all the other games I bought. I’ve tried restarting, resetting, and everything else I can think of. Fix it, basically stole my money at this point.

I have great wifi and cellular, yet there were long gaps when the app wasn’t connected to the main game server. When I finally got back in, I could not pick any cards or play. Thanks for ruining my karma. I’ll stick to the steam version. Don’t waste your money on this dog of an app.

5 stars for the base game - I got the Pennsylvania extension and it is very buggy and unplayable. Save your money on that one, and I want mine back!

Or really what I want is Pennsylvania to work well - it’s a great twist on the game, just not when it unsyncs in local mode and makes impossible to complete a game.

This game is fun but incredibly glitchy. It randomly shuts off. It kicks you out mid-game. Trying to play online with other people is terrible! It freezes and the other players start yelling at you. You have to exit the app and come back in to get it to work again. So frustrating. 

I would like to access the game on other devices but can’t figure out how. And I can’t find support anywhere.
I think there’s a bug that crashes the game if I repeatedly tap on the screen for cards

This was absolutely a 5-star game until iOS 14. I used to love this game and hadn’t played since I upgraded to iOS 14, but when I opened it, it absolutely didn’t function. I was able to play a couple of solo games, during which the app crashed several times, but then it just completely crashed and won’t work at all. Please update this for iOS 14. I love this game and want to play again!
I love Ticket to Ride, and when the app works it’s great, but it has consistently crashed on 2 iPhones now (8+ and SE 2nd gen) so I finally just gave up and deleted it.

title.label: Great game, very buggy, Germany map doesn’t function with bots

content.label:
This game is really fun and overall works well and has helped me get through COVID. However, it does crash a lot in online play. My biggest wish is that the Germany map would work with bots. If you add bots it freezes on their turn. Please fix, thank you!!

Post ios 14 notifications are broken and don't work which is a huge issue!

Please fix constant crashes so full of bugs lately

When trying to join online games it resets me to the play screen. It seems to all
Of the sudden have a lot more crashes than before

Why is it that the bots when playing solo don’t even try to win. I just played a game (which happens often) where all the bots needed to finish three routes was a two train of any color and it placed a random two train elsewhere on the board as it’s last move. I’d like a little competition. Very frustrating!!

I have had this game for a very long time and  I enjoy playing it.  Lately it won’t let me play.  It opens and before I get a choice of tickets it disappears and I have to start all over again.  Until today it would happen only once.  Today it happened many times and never would offer tickets.  Please fix what ever is causing this.
This game is fun but the should include more packs when you buy it
Also not very good customer service.
It’s ok, but for the price they should give you Europe and France

title.label: Has a GLITCH... and feels like game CHEATS

content.label: I love Ticket To Ride and own the board game. This is a good game BUT when I play SOLO it will randomly and CONSTANTLY exit my game and take me to a screen to enter online play/asking me to sign in/wants info for player profile. I play solo & never online. Also to computer knows the routes I need and continues to randomly block my only path making me waste trains & moves I know it’s doing it because at the end you can see opponents targets. The tracks blocking me have NOTHING to do w/ computer’s routes. Also, it always has the right amount of trains/right colors to always end up without leaving any unused trains. EVERY TIME!  REALLY?!? Would give it 4 or 5 stars if it didn’t have the annoying GLITCH. I have restart my phone when it starts because it gets WORSE as time passes.

title.label: Enjoyable but needs a little work

content.label: The app is very enjoyable. I like playing the game. However when playing online games, the app freezes up after the roster of players fills up. It should automatically take you into game play at that point, but it freezes instead. Requiring you to close the app, re-enter, and resume the game. This means you don’t get to pick your routes or play your first turn. The computer does it for you.

title.label: I enjoy every moment playing this game!

content.label: This game is so much fun and runs very well on my iPad

title.label: Good representation of the classic game

content.label: Decent enough user interface, though the AI is poor.

Don’t see a Developer Response on the bottom of this post? Don’t waste your money.

Sometimes, the app crashes immediately when you start a game in any mode. Local Games are the worst, though. Playing one is like walking into a field of land mines—you never know when or why the app will crash.

Beyond all the crashing: If one player leaves the app during play, even for a second, the app has trouble noticing when they return to the game. When that happens, you wait and wait. You leave again. Come back. Close the app entirely. Come back. Did that kill your game? Maybe. Maybe not. Should you “Please wait” another ten minutes or roll the dice on your evening?

When it actually does register that both players are present again, it forgets whose turn it was and locks up indefinitely for one player.

(We’re playing with two up-to-date iPhone 11’s over the same Wi-Fi and Bluetooth.)

If these bugs had been fixed within the last few years and/or it were easy to submit bugs, this would be a five-star review. The gameplay is fun and the expansions are great. For that reason, I can’t give it one star. I really want it to be as fun as it could be.

However, the Local Game bugs so consistently crush our fun—and it’s so convoluted to figure out where to go for support—that we’re fixing to check out for good.

Will I miss it? Yeah. But our tabletop version is waiting with open arms.
Just deleted the app and reinstalling. See if this helps. It always crashes in the middle of the solo game. Please fix this!
I love the board game so when I don’t have anybody to play with this is perfect

I love this game, but half the time you can’t play it because the timer keeps running down even though you played you turn. The annoying thing is that this only happens half the time, so it’s a roll of the dice as to whether you’re actually going to be able to complete your game or not.
It bugs out 80% of the time. Considering how expensive it is plus the add on board costs you’d think they would sort it out.

If someone leaves a local game mid-play (and it's very easy to accidentally leave a game) about half the time it just crashes--you get a "Please wait for absent players" screen after everyone is back, or a returning player is not offered the option of resuming the old game, or my game insists that it is not my turn and my opponent's game insists that it is.
Really great game,  except the app crashes between EVERY TURN.

I love the board game and we love the iOS version even more. But it’s very frustrating when the app crashes. Most of the time you can’t get back to resume the game you were in, which can be even more frustrating if you are most of the way through the game! Don’t count on a response from their support team anytime soon. I submitted a support request two weeks ago and still haven’t heard from them.
